  3. CHARGES AND RETURNS

    The {{ app_branding_text }} service currently only includes features without charges from {{ app_branding_text }}. By purchasing from a merchant to earn reward, you are purchasing from the promoting merchant and agree to the terms designated by each promotion. Any reward given by the merchant are provided by the merchant and you agree to the terms designated by each reward. Any rewards given by a third party providers for a promotion are provided by the third party and you agree to the terms designated by each reward. {{ app_branding_text }} is not responsible for refunds if a merchant or third party provider goes out of business or discontinues service with {{ app_branding_text }}.

  4. DESCRIPTION OF SERVICE

    {{ app_branding_text }} provides a Mobile Service and Web Service to track loyalty purchases with participating merchants. You may redeem products for each respective reward campaigns at the participating merchant according to the terms set by the promotion. You may receive exclusive rewards or promotions in conjunction with their loyalty actions.

  5. MOBILE SERVICE

    You are required to use the latest version of the Mobile Client in order to use the Mobile Service provided by {{ app_branding_text }}. The Mobile Client may only be download from official channels provided and approved by {{ app_branding_text }}. Only supported devices as defined by the issuing marketplace may use the Mobile Client. {{ app_branding_text }} is not responsible or obliged to support any devices that do not meet these standards.

User comments stored may contain content that people find objectionable, inappropriate, or offensive. {{ app_branding_text }} does not assume responsibility for the content presented in the Mobile Service or Web Service.

  10. MEMBER ACCOUNT, PASSWORD AND SECURITY

    Upon registration, you will generate a password and account designation or utilize the log in service of partner services such as Facebook to complete the Service’s registration process. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the password and account and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your password or account. You agree to:

    1. immediately notify {{ app_branding_text }} of any unauthorized use of your password or account or any other breach of security, and
    2. ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session
    3. keep your account information updated and accurate. {{ app_branding_text }} cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this Section 9.

    4. respond to your requests for customer service;
    5. protect the rights, property or personal safety of {{ app_branding_text }}, its users and the public.

    1. transmissions over various networks; and
    2. changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices.

You may not attempt to override or circumvent any of the usage rules embedded into the Service. Any unauthorized reproduction, publication, further distribution or public exhibition of the materials provided on the Service, in whole or in part, is strictly prohibited.

At any time you may opt out of receive notifications from {{ app_branding_text }} through its messaging channels include but not limited to email, push notifications and SMS.

  11. TERMINATION

    You agree that {{ app_branding_text }} may, under certain circumstances and without prior notice, immediately terminate your {{ app_branding_text }} account, any associated reward, and access to the Service. Cause for such termination shall include, but not be limited to,

    1. breaches or violations of the Terms of Service or other incorporated agreements or guidelines,
    2. requests by law enforcement or other government agencies,
    3. a request by you (self-initiated account deletions),
    4. discontinuance or material modification to the Service (or any part thereof),
    5. unexpected technical or security issues,
    6. extended periods of inactivity,
    7. engagement by you in fraudulent or illegal activities,
    8. nonpayment of any fees owed by you in connection with the Services.

    Termination of your {{ app_branding_text }} account includes:

    1. removal of access to all offerings within the Service, including but not limited to www.penefit.com and {{ app_branding_text }} text messaging services,
    2. deletion of your password and all related information, files and content associated with or inside your account (or any part thereof), and
    3. barring of further use of the Service. Further, you agree that all terminations for cause shall be made in {{ app_branding_text }}’s sole discretion and that {{ app_branding_text }} shall not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of your account, any associated messages and {{ app_branding_text }} codes, or access to the Service.
